map

Interface IEdge

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Edge

    public interface IEdge
    Represent the points of the map where more than two roads are adjacent
    Author:
    Romain LAFON

      • equals

        boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Say if an edge is equals to another object or not
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o: - the object to compare
        Returns:
        true if the specified object is also an edge, it has the same number of neighboring summits, the same neighboring summits, the same type and the same coordinates, or false otherwise
